metadata.name: Formatter Only Template (Vidhin)
metadata.description: Unlike the standard Formatter, this formatter keeps the full rseMatched information to use for debugging rseMatched scores with TRaSH guides. The template will still only import the formatter, nothing else will be affected.The formatter is clean without flashy emojis, while comprehensive for stream selection.
